content.title: Money, money, money.
content.text: Your pay check will come every hour. You will earn state benefits if you are not employed (the amount is set by the government). If you are employed you will earn your wage, but 10% of it will be subtracted as income tax. If you are not a donator, you earn 0.4% in interest from what ever is in your bank account. If you are a donator, your interest will be determined by how much you donate. Each car or property that you own will also be taxed according to how much that property or car is worth.
